title: Night Market Test
summary: Two masked parties exchanged a hard case at the East Night Market. Handoff lasted ~8 seconds; one party arrived and left through staff-only corridors.
blackmail_material: Thermal stills show package weight variance before/after handoff.

title: Dockside Meet Suspected Informant Contact
summary: High-ranking MW figure met with an unknown driver at Berth 42. Short conversation, vehicle never powered down.
blackmail_material: Plate image cross-matches a sealed asset list.

title: Shortwave Bursts MW Cipher Variant
summary: Three shortwave bursts at 7.021 MHz matched a Most Wanted derivative key. Pattern suggests staging call.
blackmail_material: Emitter triangulated within 400m of Legion Square garage roof.

title: Shell Chain Lease Warehouse Node
summary: A three-layer shell company secured a 24/7-access lease near Little Seoul freight spur; matches prior logistics nodes.

title: Cafe Handoff Envelope Exchange
summary: Primary met unknown female at Midtown Cafe and passed a thin envelope under the table.
blackmail_material: Clear image of envelope corner visible in seat gap.
